Item.name: Blowout Alarm
Item.description: An alarm that should be placed alongside Europan Surface Radiation. It will sound off whenever a blowout is imminent.

Item.name: Europan Surface Radiation
Item.description: When placed at the top of a map, this simulates Europan Surface Radiation, alongside periodic blowout sequences which have the potential to zombify people if they die during one. Avoiding a blowout sequence is simple: get inside.

Item.name: Phalanx Pills
Item.description: A suppressant capable of halting the negative effects of Functional Necrosis. However, this is only borrowed time, as it will eventually wear off. Lasts for 2 minutes, ineffective against other diseases.

Item.name: Antizin Injector
Item.description: An injector unit only able to load Antizin or similarly-packaged compounds.

Item.name: Antizin
Item.description: A chemical compound which suppresses most infections, prolonging the user's life. Has to be loaded into a compatible auto-injector to function. Lasts for 15 minutes. DO NOT USE IF UNINFECTED!

Item.name: Gene Therapy
Item.description: A CRISPr solution useful in the treatment of almost every infection. Causes severe oxygen deprivation upon use, and cures infections. Small chance of genetic mutation. Use wisely, as this is an exceedingly rare find.

Item.name: Atropine Auto-Injector
Item.description: A solution of epinephrine, atropine, and saline, capable of bringing someone out of a critical state in a pinch. Reduces blood loss, cures oxygen loss, and kickstarts regeneration. Effective in purging toxins from the bloodstream if used twice on the same patient. Has 2 uses remaining.

StatusEffect.description: A solution of epinephrine, atropine, and saline, capable of bringing someone out of a critical state in a pinch. Reduces blood loss, cures oxygen loss, and kickstarts regeneration. Effective in purging toxins from the bloodstream if used twice on the same patient. Has 1 use remaining.

Item.name: Creutzfeldt Necrophorum Sample
Item.description: An engineered virus causing unexplained bleeding, nausea, facial disfiguration, and eventual detachment of the temporal, parietal, and frontal lobes. Patients past this state are incurable and very hostile.

Item.name: Streptococcus Lyssavirus Sample
Item.description: An engineered virus causing unexplained bleeding, nausea, facial disfiguration, and eventual detachment of the temporal, parietal, and frontal lobes. Patients past this state are incurable and very hostile.

Item.name: Knox Infection Sample
Item.description: An incurable virus causing nausea, anxiety, paranoia, psychosis, vomiting, and eventual death. Patients who die while under the effects of this infection will reanimate and attempt to bite the uninfected. Anyone who gets bitten is considered lost. Lacerations after a fight with a zombie are to be watched closely.

Item.name: Hero's Beret
Item.description: The hat of a war veteran who made the ultimate sacrifice while fighting the restless horde. Appears to be imbued with the power of multiple universes, allowing the user to continue fighting when all hope seems lost.

Item.name: Richard
Item.description: Do you like hurting other people? If you fall into critical condition while wearing this, you can live out all of your brutal fantasies, but beware, for its lethal power can be turned against you.

Item.name: Bloodied Hockey Mask
Item.description: You haven't checked a calender lately but you're sure it's Friday the Thirteenth on 𝘴𝘰𝘮𝘦 planet. If you fall into critical condition, a temporary pact with an entity is formed, allowing you to exact vengeance upon those who have wronged you. Your sins weigh you down, however, causing you to move much slower.

Item.name: Strangulated
Item.description: You're being strangled to death. Nobody can hear your screams.

Item.name: Strangler
Item.description: You're being strangled to death. Nobody can hear your screams.
